Recovery From Home
  • About
  • Gideon de Wit
  • Testimonials

21 Days is an intensive addiction treatment program done from your own home. In most cases you will be able to continue with work as per normal.

Get Started

The program includes:

  1. Medical diagnosis with appropriate medication to ease the dentification period
  2. Random drug testing (at your home)
  3. Bespoke neuropsychological therapy that gets to the root cause behind addiction.
  4. Minimum of 3 neuropsychological therapeutic 1 on 1 sessions per week
  5. Minimum of 1 group session per week
  6. Minimum of 1 family group session
  7. 24-hour a day SOS support
  8. Reading material and homework

Addiction treatment from home is a good option for individuals who:

  1. Cannot stop their regular day job
  2. Can’t afford the usual high inpatient fees
  3. Have relapsed
  4. Are concerned about their addictive behaviours, but not ready to commit to a rehabilitation centre
  5. Have a high concern for personal privacy

Unlocking the Subconscious Mind

Do you sometimes feel …
You are stuck in your own mind?
Are trying harder, but keep making the same mistakes?
Your current life strategy is not delivering the goods?


People live their lives through instinct (subconsciousness) rather than concrete and objective knowledge about their true state of mind. This knowledge is hidden from the conscious brain – and yet it is the driver of everything in our life!


What is your game plan for life? What is going on in your head?


Through Liminality, I offer scientific, clear, and measurable insight into your unknown strategies and help you remodel stumbling blocks into springboards. This is vastly different from personality analysis.


It gets to the root of the problem, not the symptoms!


The duration of the course is 21 days. The total cost is R20 000 (non-refundable) and can be partially claimed back from medical aid. If you are not a suitable candidate, you will be liable for a R1 000 diagnostic session. Because of the personal nature of the treatment, clients need to live in the broader Cape Town area.
